ComicInfo.Summary:
Get your daily recommended allowance of giant killer robots, mad scientists, zombies, voodoo priests, decapitations, and midgets! It's everything a growing boy needs. Dark Horse Comics presents issue #2 of Eric Powell's, The Goon! It's more fun than a knife to the eye! The Goon faces off against the diabolical Dr. Alloy and the indomitable iron menace Bruno in a battle that may be too much for our heroic hooligan!
Zombies provided by Jethro and Earl Zombie Wranglerin' and The Adopt-A-Zombie Foundation.
